author: SleepyShPoster
title: One of the better "free rewards."
review:
I had to come back and write a review for this after receiving a Ninjago keychain as my prize for spending a ton on Christmas gifts.

I got this guy last Christmas and decided to break him out this Christmas. He seriously makes a cute decoration, what with his house and such.

Don't buy this off eBay unless it has the box included. If you manage to find one, though, it's fantastic.

author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Nice Minifigure with beautiful box set and design
review:
Opening;

The gingerbread man clamshell box set is a nice figure with exclusive prints  .

The Minifigure-

The figure has a smiley gingerbread man face print on the dual moulded head , a printed torso and printed legs all in living / frosting  .

In conclusion -

this is a good figure with nice printing and nicely presented packaging so I recommend it
